comment.desc: Delicious pastries! The croissants are to die for.
Cozy atmosphere and friendly staff. Will definitely come back!
The espresso here is amazing! Perfectly balanced and rich.
The quiche was a bit dry, but the salad was fresh and flavorful.
Great spot for a quick lunch break. The sandwiches are filling and reasonably priced.
